name: Origins (Virtual Ravens Games, Nachete07, Blinx24, Rocío Campo, Requenisima21)
name_original: Origins (Virtual Ravens Games, Nachete07, Blinx24, Rocío Campo, Requenisima21)
description:
Synopsis

In the distant past, there were four types of element races: wind, fire, ground, and water. For centuries, they lived harmoniously until the dark matter was stolen by the ground.  

Objective

As one of these cats, you must steal dark matter from your enemies in order to win the game. 

Controls  Player 1Player 2V keySteal the dark matterP key
W keyUp movementUp ArrowA keyLeft movementLeft ArrowS keyDown movement Down ArrowD keyRight movementRight Arrow
